tool_description: State of the art grammar and spelling checker based on deep neural networks.
name: GrammarBot Neural
title: GrammarBot Neural

api_list.name: check
api_list.description: Check grammar of input text and receive auto-corrected text along with a list of suggested corrections.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://grammarbot-neural.p.rapidapi.com/v1/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "grammarbot-neural.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://grammarbot-neural.p.rapidapi.com/v1/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "grammarbot-neural.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
